component.name: Meu Imposto de Renda
component.summary: Brazilian natural person income tax (IRPF) declaration generator

description.p: The 2022 declaration is available and with news! Mandatory user authentication with the gov.br account. If you have a gold or silver level, access to all services, including declarations from previous years:

ul.li: ease of filling in the 2022 declaration with the pre-filled one
DARF emission, with bar code and possibility of PIX
